Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Starboard
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("starboard", "Manage the starboard!")]
public class StarboardSlash : MewdekoSlashSubmodule<StarboardService>, IInteractionModuleBase

SetRepostThreshold(int)

Set after how many messages Mewdeko reposts a starboard message.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("repostthreshold", "Set after how many messages mewdeko reposts a starboard message", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]
public Task SetRepostThreshold(int num)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int num

The threshold value for reposting a starboard message.

SetStar(string?)

Sets or gets the current starboard emote.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("star", "Sets or gets the current starboard emote", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]
public Task SetStar(string? emoteText = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string emoteText

The string representation of the emote to set as the starboard emote, or null to retrieve the current emote.

SetStarboard(ITextChannel?)

Sets the starboard channel. Put nothing to disable.

Declaration

public Task SetStarboard(ITextChannel? chn = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description

The channel to set as the starboard channel, or null to disable the starboard feature.
